header.title: Artifex.AI Studio Pro
header.subtitle: Your AI-powered creative suite for generating compelling product descriptions and visualizing ideas with detailed storyboards and video clips.

inputForm.keyFeaturesPlaceholder: e.g., AI-powered monitoring, HEPA H13 filter, whisper-quiet...

storyboardForm.ideaPlaceholder: e.g., An epic cinematic trailer for a futuristic flying car.

storyboardSettings.title: Advanced Settings
storyboardSettings.videoNote: Note: Video generation can take several minutes per clip.

storyboardDisplay.title: Generated Storyboard
storyboardDisplay.quotaError: You have exceeded the image generation quota for your plan.
storyboardDisplay.quotaErrorCheckPlan: Please check your usage and limits on {{link}}.
storyboardDisplay.generateClipTitle: Generate a short video clip for this scene
storyboardDisplay.generatingClipHint: This may take a few minutes.
storyboardDisplay.generateClipPrompt: Generate a video for this scene.

detailedModal.title: Expand Scene
detailedModal.loadingMessage:
Expanding scene into detailed shots...
This may take a moment.

apiKeyInstructions.title: API Key Required
apiKeyInstructions.welcome: To use Artifex.AI Studio, you need to provide your own Google Gemini API key.
apiKeyInstructions.step1: Go to {{link}} and click 'Create API key'.
apiKeyInstructions.step2: Copy your new API key and add it to this project's Secrets tab under the name {{apiKey}}.
apiKeyInstructions.step3: Reload the app, and you'll be ready to start creating!
apiKeyInstructions.disclaimer: Your API key is stored securely in your project's secrets and is not exposed on the client-side.

sampleModal.storySearchPlaceholder: Search for an idea or keyword...

galleryModal.title: Project Gallery
galleryModal.noProjects: You have no saved projects yet.

mediaArt.selectImageSubprompt: Choose from a gallery of famous paintings or upload your own.

mediaArtStyles.subtleMotionDesc: Gentle, flowing movements in the background and foreground elements.
mediaArtStyles.parallaxDesc: Creates a 3D effect by moving layers at different speeds.
mediaArtStyles.dreamlikeDesc: Adds flowing, surreal, and magical visual effects.
mediaArtStyles.elementalDesc: Infuses the image with effects like wind, fire, or water.

imageModal.title: Select Source Image
imageModal.uploadHint: PNG, JPG, or WEBP up to 4MB

errors.descriptionGeneration: Failed to generate description. Please try again.
errors.storyboardGeneration: Failed to generate storyboard. Please check your settings and try again.
errors.sceneExpansion: Failed to expand the scene. Please try again.
errors.videoGeneration: Failed to generate video. This can happen under heavy load. Please try again later.
errors.mediaArtGeneration: Failed to generate media art scenes. The source image might be too complex.
errors.visualArtGeneration: Failed to generate the video. Please try a different text or effect.
